tier.item: (8) Chan mise a chuirfeadh t isteach
COP.+NEG. me COMP put(CONDIT. analytic) trace in
"It's not me that would apply for that job."

COP.+NEG. me COMP put(CONDIT. analytic) trace in
"It's not me that would apply for that job."
Chan mise a chuirfeadh t isteach ar an phost sin.
COP.+NEG.me COMP put(CONDIT.analytic) trace in on that job
It's not me that would apply for that job.
(9) *Chuirfeadh m´ isteach ar an phost sin.
put(CONDIT. analytic) I in on that job
I would apply for that job.

put(CONDIT.1st sing.synthetic) pro in on that job

Hari-erg Sita Ramesh-acc know is that said
